hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "whoever desires an expansion in his sustenance and age, should keep good relations with his Kith and kin

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَحَبَّ الْبَسْطَ فِي الرِّزْقِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever liked to expand in his sustenance
